title: CI/CD Pipelines
description: Automated CI/CD pipelines for various projects, focusing on streamlined testing, building, and deployment processes.
details:
Pipeline implementations:

  • GitHub Actions workflows for automated testing and deployment
  • Docker containerization for consistent environments
  • Automated versioning and release management
  • Integration with monitoring and alerting systems
  • Infrastructure as Code with Terraform

Technologies: GitHub Actions, Docker, Terraform, Bash
